Translations.Text: Ni$ lmumnin rebeen
Wid ipeallan s wannuz
wid ijunben yir awal
wid ipzekkin
wid ieurben af tuzzuft nnsen
siwa ar tlawin nnsen, ne$ taklatin nnsen. Akka, ur degsen tiyta
wid ib$an sennig waya, widak zegren tilisa
wid ipqadaren lamanat nnsen, u lemaahda nnsen
wid iwennaen tieilla nnsen
D wigi ay d iweooaten
wid ara iweoten Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Ni$ Nexleq amdan, seg ufuil n talaxt
sinna, Nerra t d tiqqit deg umekkan n laman
sinna, tiqqit Nxelq ip d argen; d$a, argen Nxelq it d acelleqluq; d$a, acelleqluq Nxelq it d i$san; d$a, Nessels aksum i yi$san. Sinna, Nxelq it d lxelq amaynut. Ad Ibarek Oebbi, Imxeyyeo ixellaqen
Sinna, deffir waya, war ccekk, a ppemmtem
Sinna, ih, ass n tnekra, a d tu$alem
Ni$ Nexleq, sennig wen, ua iberdan. Ur Nelli, $ef uxlaq, seg i$wefliyen
Nessader ed, seg igenni, aman s lmizan. Naateq iten di tmurt. Nezmer a ten Nessoue
Nxelq awen, yissen, leonanat n tezdayin akked teuoin; degsen, i kunwi, aias n yizwayen, teppeppem segsen
Akked ttejoa, id iff$en seg udrar n Sina. Teppak ed zzit u ddhin, i wid iteppen
Ih, di lmal, aselmed i kunwi. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg iaabbav nnsen. Aias n uba$uo degsen, i kunwi. Teppeppem segsen
Fellasen, u $ef lbabuo, ppawin kwen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi. Ur awen illi oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezziben ara
Nnan imvebboen ijehliyen, n ugdud is: "wagi d amdan kan, am kunwi; ib$a a d ikk sennig wen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, a d Issers lmalayek. Ur nesli s waya, ar lejdud nne$ imezwura
Neppa d argaz kan aoehbani. Qaoaaet ep, tallit kan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi

Nweeea yas d: "eunaa lbabuo, ger wallen nne£, s uweeei nne£. Mi d iusa lameo nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran, d ihedman, awi degs, tayuga n yal uuenf, akked twacult ik, siwa wid, segsen, i$ef id izwar wawal. Ur iyI d steqsay af wid idensen, nitni, war ccekk, ad pwa$evsen
Mi taanncev di lbabur, kecc akked wid illan yidek, ini: ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Iselken seg ugdud imednas
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ssers iyi deg umekkan ioqan; Kecc Tifev akw wid issrusun
War ccekk, ayagi, d issekniyen, u Nekwni, Nezga d wid ipjeooiben
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Nuzen asen d amazan, segsen: "aabdet Oebbi, ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nnan imvebboen ijehliyen n ugdud is, wid iugin u inekoen timlilit n laxeot, wid Ne$na di tmeddurt n ddunit: "wagi d amdan kan am kunwi, itepp seg wayen teppeppem, itess seg wayen teppessem
Ma tessemeessem i umdan i kwen icban, war ccekk, kunwi seg imexsuoen
Day i wen iaahed ard a d teff$em mara temmtem, tu$alem d akal, d i$san
Ibaad, Ibaad, ayen i wen ippuwaaaden
I illan kan, d tameddurt n ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir, nekwni ur d neppenkar
Neppa, d argaz kan id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi. Nekwni, ur numin yis
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi
Inna: "garane$ d cwii, a d gwrin di nndama
Iwwet iten usu$u, s tidep. Nerra ten d rrmim. Err akin, agdud imednas
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Lois ur d isseqoab, ur iswexxio, lajel is
Sinna, Nuzen ed imazanen nne£, wa deffir wa. Yal tikelt ideg ara d ias umazan, ar lois is, a t skiddben. Nerra ten mestebaan, Nerra ten d tidyanin. Err akin, agdud ur neppamen
Sinna, Nuzen ed Musa akked gma s Haoun, s issekniyen nne£, akked udabu n uuee
eo Feraun akked imvebboen is. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud amzuxxi
Nnan: "Day a namen sin imdanen am nekwni, u agdud nnsen d aklan nne
Skaddben ten, d$a u$alen seg wid ipwan$an
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, amar ad pwanhun
Nerra mmi s n Meryem, akked imma s, d assekni. Nesduri ten di ti$ilt, degs laman d waman
A yimazanen, eccet seg wayen imaanen, xedmet ayen ilhan, Nek, eoi$ ayen txeddmem
Lois agi nnwen, s tidep, d lois yiwen. Nek, d Mass nnwen, ihi eezbet iyI
Bvan lameo nnsen garasen, mi mfaoaqen. Yal akabar ifoee s wayla s
Eoo iten di maylellif nnsen, tallit kan
Day $ilen mi sen Nefka ayla, tarwa
ad asen Nezzazal lxio? Xaii, ur faqen
Ih, wid, si tugwdi n Mass nnsen, peadaren
wid iumnen s issekniyen n Mass nnsen
wid ur nepcarak i Mass nnsen
wid ippaken ayen fkan, ulawen nnsen ugaden mi, nitni, ad u$alen ar Mass nnsen
widak, peirin ar lxio u, $uoes, zeggwiren
Ur Nepkellif taowiet, siwa ar wayen iwumi tezmer. £uone£ Tazmamt, tessawal tidep. Nitni ur twadensen
Maca, ulawen nnsen di maylellif, $ef tagi. U rnan yir igiten i waya, a ten xedmen
Alamma, mi Nesaadda aaaqeb $ef isaayen nnsen, a d su$en
Ur psu$ut, ass agi, kunwi, segne$, ur tepwasellkem
Ni$ mlan awen issekniyen iW, trewlem asen
tesme$woem iman nnwen fellasen. Teppaawazem, tekkatem
Day ur meyyzen ara Awal? Day ur ten id iusa ara, wayen ur d nusi ar lejdud nnsen imezwura
Ne$ day ur ssinen ara amazan nnsen, imi t nekoen
Ne$ qqaoen: "ikcem it loenn"? Xaii, iusa ten id s tidep. Tegwti degsen, kerhen tidep
Lemmer tedda tidep d lhawiyyat nnsen, war ccekk, tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan degsen, ad fesden. Xaii, Nebbwi yasen d asmekti nnsen. Nitni asmekti nnsen ooan t
Ne$, ad asen tessutrev taqdiat? Ppif taqdiat n Mass ik. Neppa Yif akw ioeeeaqen
Kecc, s tidep, la ten tneccdev s abrid uwqim
Wid ur numin ara s laxeot, s tidep, ff$en i ubrid
Xas Neun fellasen, u Nekkes asen ccqa nnsen, ad vellelen di leqheo nnsen, ad ddebdeben
Ni$ Nesaadda fellasen aaaqeb. Ur knan i Mass nnsen, ur nujen
Armi, mara asen Nelli tabburt uaaqeb iqeseen, imiren, degs, ad aysen
Neppa i wen Ixelqen timesliwt, ieoi, ulawen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Neppa ikwen Iwezzaen di tmurt. £uoeS ara tepwafesrem
Neppa i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. IneS afraz n yiv akked wass. Day ur tefhimem ara
Xaii. Nnan akken d nnan imezwura
Nnan: "Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, d i$san, day a $ d ssekren
Ni$ ippuaahed wayagi i nekwni, akw, zik, i imezwura nne$. Ayagi, siwa d timucuha imezwura
Ini: "wi p ilan tmurt, akked wayen illan degs, ma tessnem
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ini: "anwa ay d Mass n ua igenwan? Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
Ini: "anwa i Isaan tagelda n yal cci, ger ifassen iS; Neppa Ipearab, ur illi ueareb fellaS, ma teppissinem
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, acimi tepwamelkem
Xaii! Nefka yasen tidep, nitni, war ccek, d ikeddaben
Ur Isai Oebbi mmi S. Ur illi oebbi ar tama S. Mulac yal oebbi ad iawi ayen id ixleq, wa ad iagwar wa. Gedha s Oebbi, seg wayen id snulfuyen
Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. D Aalayan, sennig wayen pcaraken
Ini: "a Mass iw! Lemmer a yi d Tesseknev acu i sen ippuaahden
A Mass iw, ur iyi Ppara deg ugdud imednas
S tidep, Nezmer ad ak Nessken acu i sen Naahed
Err akin tucmip s lfayeq. Nekwni Neeoa, sennig wiyav, ayen d snulfuyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Eerz iyi seg u$wayen n ccwaien. Ee
Eerz iyi, a Mass iw! Ur dgi ppilin
Armi, mi d tusa tmeppant yiwen degsen, inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi
amar ad xedme$ ayen ilhan deg wayen ooi$". Xaii, d awal kan id inna. Tella, deffir es, tse$lit, alamma d ass n tnekra
Ma uuven di lbuq, assen, ur ppemyilin, ur pmesteqsayen
Wid iwumi eeay lmizan nnsen, nitni rebeen
Wid iwumi fessus lmizan nnsen, d nitni i issexsoen iman nnsen. Di Loahennama ad wekkoen
A ppesser$ tmes udmawen nnsen, ad asen zelgen icenfiren
Day ur awen qaren ara issekniyen iW, wanag la ten tnekoem
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! I$leb ane$ ccum nne$. Nella d agdud im$eoqen
A Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$ segs. Ma nesnager, ihi, d imednas ay nella
Ad Yini: "qqimet degs, ur pmeslayet
Ih, illa urbaa n imdanen iW i iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Numen. Semmee ane$, Eun fella$, Kecc Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Tettihim fellasen armi i wen sseppun asmekti W, u tdessem degsen
Nek, assa, Kufa$ ten $ef wayen ueboen. D nitni, war ccekk, ay d imerbae
Inna: "aceal iseggwasen i teqqimem deg wakal
Nnan: "Neqqim ass, ne$ ur ibbwiv wass, steqsi wid ieepben
Inna: "cwii kan ay teqqimen, lemmer, s tidep, day tessinem
Day t$ilem Nxelq ikwen, kan, di rrayaa; ar ur d teppu$alem $uone£
Ay Meqqweo Oebbi, Agellid, Tidep! Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ukyis
Win inaaoen, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, ur isai ppbut fellas, aqeiii s ar Mass is kan. Ih, ur rebeen ara ijehliyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Semmee u Eun. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
